name: PDFReaderChatbot
description: This is a chatbot application built using Streamlit, LangChain, and OpenAI. It allows users to upload multiple PDFs, process the documents, and enables them to ask questions related to the content of the PDFs.

name: Pokédex
description: A dynamic Pokédex website that lets users search, explore, and view detailed information about Pokémon using live API data.

name: Premier League Dashboard
description: A modern React dashboard for tracking Premier League standings, live matches, and team information with real-time updates and smart API caching to minimize requests.

name: Run Room
description: A fitness gamification platform that connects to Strava, converts running/walking kilometers into points, and lets users redeem items to furnish their personalized 3D virtual recovery room built with React Three Fiber.
